mapper.select: SELECT tb_WalvesAssembly.FMeterCode,tb_WalvesAssembly.FMeterDirection as fmeterdirection,tb_WalvesAssembly.FCoverName as fmetername,tb_WalvesAssembly.FValveCode as fvalvecode, t.FBoxCode,b.FDBatchID,d.FCustomerID,s.FName as fcustomer,d.FDate AS fsaletime FROM tb_WalvesAssembly LEFT JOIN TPackDetails t ON t.FMeterCode=tb_WalvesAssembly.FMeterCode LEFT JOIN TBox b ON t.FBoxCode=b.FBoxCode LEFT JOIN TDeliveryBatch d ON d.FDBatchID=b.FDBatchID LEFT JOIN TCustomers s ON s.FCustomerID=d.FCustomerID WHERE tb_WalvesAssembly.FMeterCode=#{fmetercode};
